body: If I have that brainwash ability I won't be doing shit like this. This is actually pretty tame. I'll get myself a whole luxury apartment building, with at least 100 top tier bitches
lol this would never happen. good ntr though

I've read a lot of ntr and some other fucked up stories but somehow, I find Takei Masaki's ntr works very disturbing.
Art can be very scary. It can make you feel bad but then you still appreciate it in some ways.
This is high quality torture. My brain hurts. I feel like I need to binge on vanilla shit for an entire month to regain my sanity.
Um is there a reason as to why almost every character is brainwashed
